quest.name: Midge Madness
journal: This hungry Hyur does not know where his next meal is coming from.
objectives: Place the smoke bombs at the designated locations and disperse the midge clouds.

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: Good eveningmorningafternoon. Fancy helping me with an errand?

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: I'd come here from Ala Gannha to buy food, but I was just told there's been no harvest here either.

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: I thought I might see what wild plants I could pick up instead. However, the area I had my eye on is home to a swarm of midges.

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: If you think you're up to it, I'd like to ask you to take care of these bugs. Meet me back in Ala Gannha if you're willing.

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: As you're doubtless aware, insects aren't too fond of smoke. I decided to create smoke bombs to scare them off with the gunpowder we use for quarrying.

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: Use them to deal with the creatures. You'll find them west of the village.

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: Use the smoke bombs to deal with the creatures. You'll find them west of the village.

dialogue.name: MAN02650
dialogue.text: Here's your reward for helping. I'll head off now to collect what plants I can.
